item.title: How do you change the price of a item in a shop?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_faggot Mod faggot
item.description:
@Mod_faggot wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:5, topic:107545”][quote author=Mod faggot link=topic=153946.msg1449607#msg1449607 date=1181287451]

Go into your “Shop.cfg” file found in your Source file. Look for the shop that you are trying to edit. Look for the item ID in which you wish to change the price of. You will see at the top that there are the words “Item and Amount” Under the “Amount” you can change the price of the item.

Hope this helps.

–Tico135–

Thats the amount of the items in the shop :{
[/quote]

There are the headings “Item and Amount” these show what items are sold in the hop as well as the price.[/quote]

No, not the price. Its the amount of the items in the store…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the price of a item in a shop?

item.title: How do you change the price of a item in a shop?
item.dc:creator: @Nightz Nightz
item.description:
@Nightz wrote:

Open up item.java <<SPELLED LIKE THAT!!

Look up the item you wanna edit its price like Example;

0001    Toy       Its a very nice toy too!!      1000    1000   1000

The first 3 numbers edit them…

Make sure not to paste that one…

Read full topic
